ygData.subject: Re: Dodge
ygData.msgSnippet: first off, it trains on its own and is a Automatic skill. Put about 15 points in it to start it off, not just one..8) Morgul ... From: David
ygData.messageBody:
first off, it trains on its own and is a Automatic skill. Put about 15
points in it to start it off, not just one..8)
Morgul
----- Original Message -----
From: David <milamber@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 10:15 AM
Subject: [shadowknight] Dodge


> From: "David" <milamber@...>
>
> OK, I was browsing some things last night and noticed I had Dodge
available
> to me. I went to the combat/socail/skills areas and did not find it
listed.
> Is this an automatic thing that gets better overtime, without me hitting a
> button like bash? I trained one point in it so it said you have learned
> Dodge.
>
> Tenin - Tarew Marr
>
